thread.section_title: Hiberia Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good location
thread.title_full: Good location - Review of Hiberia Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Fussyteam
title: Good location
text: Lovely hotel in a good location. The staff were very friendly & helpful. Free wifi everywhere in the hotel. Hairdryer, & tea/coffee making facilities in the rooms. Breakfast had hot & cold food. However, they need to invest in another toaster as a domestic 4 slice one is not adequate, resulting in everyone queuing for toast. Cosy little bar area, with reasonably priced drinks.
